Random Project
About me

Weather-App

This is a Weather App which takes Weather data (of any city) from WeatherApi and weather-based Gifs from GiphyApi.

The only part I don't like of it it's that it asks for your own Api Keys, but in the future I might find a safe solution for that (by using mines)

It has available a forecast of 3 days (using the free subscription features), where it tells you the current Weather, the soon one and the next two days. It's not really a "3 days forecast" since it only forecast from today to the day after tomorrow.

It's done in HTML, CSS and JavaScript but it was way easier than the ToDoList Project but also fun since I've used for the first time the APIs. It's from the course "The Odin Project"
